Dialogue.Page: Howdy there, hatchling! You remember me, right? Tektite's twin, Scoria? Used to work in the mines, before my back gave out.
Anyways, I've been trying to find a purpose for all of these soft, worthless metals that Tuff and I dug up over the years.
I figured it'd be nice to turn it into something useful, y'know, so... drum roll, please!...
Presenting Scoria's golden marshmallows! Shiny metals molded into an easy, convenient to carry shape! Not that tasty though.
You might be wondering, "How's inedible confectionary useful, Scoria?" Well, I reckon we could use 'em as a representation of value for tradin' stuff.
So instead of saying "I'll give ya three fish for your axe," you could exchange each fish for two marshmallows, and then six marshmallows for an axe. You followin', hatchling?
Well, since you generously listened to my whole pitch, how about I give ya some to start? Maybe if an up-and-comer like yourself starts trading them, it'll finally catch on!
I'll also exchange any odds and ends you find for marshmallows, and marshmallows for whatever I've got on hand. Come see me any time!
Howdy there, hatchling! Got something to trade?

DialogueOption.Text: I have some items to exchange.
I'd like to trade you back for an item I gave you.
